Slide

Become a Member

[JOIN TODAY](http://web.archive.org/web/20251118194304/https://tickets.cincymuseum.org/freedomcenter/events/99589603-1671-b66a-1a17-e3e472bfbd3c)

Become a modern-day abolitionist

Help us share this history with the public while enjoying exclusive perks along the way.

Membership Benefits 

✅ Unlimited general admission for one year  
✅ $2 off any general admission guest ticket purchases  
✅ 15% off Freedom Store purchases  
✅ 50% off general admission at Cincinnati Museum Center (Excludes Holocaust and Humanity Center, OMNIMAX® and special exhibits)  
✅ Access to special programming  
✅ Exclusive Member e-News updates  
✅ Digital membership card  

Membership Levels 

**FAMILY $65**  
Full Membership benefits for one or two adults and six children or grandchildren, 17 years and under

**INDIVIDUAL + ONE $55**  
Full Membership benefits for one adult, plus one free guest each visit

**INDIVIDUAL $40**  
Full Membership benefits for one adult

_All Memberships are valid for 12 months and are non-transferable and non-refundable._  
_Senior rates available._

[ JOIN ONLINE TODAY  ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251118194304/https://tickets.cincymuseum.org/freedomcenter/events?utm_source=buytix_nurfc&utm_medium=google_nurfc&utm_campaign=general_nurfc&__hstc=12409899.2f347bc3b0aea49047a6ab921c8879be.1709575027392.1733425794302.1733510415065.367&__hssc=12409899.9.1733510415065&__hsfp=2852874244&category=Membership)

Revealing Stories of Courage,   
Cooperation, and Perseverance

Welcome to the National Underground Railroad Freedom Center

### Freedom Center OPEN on MLK Day

Freedom Center offers free admission, variety of programs on January 19, Martin Luther King, Jr. Day.

[ LEARN MORE  ](https://freedomcenter.org/voice/press_release/mlk-2026/)

[ ](https://freedomcenter.org/special-exhibitions/jubilation/)

[ ](https://freedomcenter.org/special-exhibitions/jubilation/)

### King Legacy Celebration 2026

Bringing together civic leaders, business professionals, activists and community members for for reflection and inspiration

[ LEARN MORE  ](https://freedomcenter.org/voice/event/klc26/)

### Jubilation! Ambassadors on a Sacred Journey

Celebrate the history, accomplishments and legacy of the Fisk Jubilee Singers®

[ LEARN MORE  ](https://freedomcenter.org/special-exhibitions/jubilation/)

[ ](https://freedomcenter.org/special-exhibitions/jubilation/)

### Fifth Third Community Days

Enjoy free admission on the fifth and third Sunday each month, plus MLK Day and Juneteenth.

[ LEARN MORE  ](https://freedomcenter.org/53-community-days/)

Become a member or renew online today
